name: coronavirus
description: A dashboard for corona virus stats

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "nodemon --ignore 'client/*' --exec npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.client: AUTHOR=$(node -p "require('./package.json').author") && APP_NAME=$(node -p "require('./package.json').displayName") && cd client && env REACT_APP_NAME="$APP_NAME" REACT_APP_AUTHOR="$AUTHOR" REACT_APP_GA="UA-0000000-00" npm run start
scripts.build: GA=$(node -p "require('./package.json').googleAnalytics") && AUTHOR=$(node -p "require('./package.json').author") && APP_NAME=$(node -p "require('./package.json').displayName") && cd client && env REACT_APP_NAME="$APP_NAME" REACT_APP_AUTHOR="$AUTHOR" REACT_APP_GA="$GA" npm run build

author: John Young
